attributes.action: Stop Seal Skin Trade/Imports due to Seal Culling in Canada
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Great Britain should stop trading and have nothing to do with any products due to the barbaric so called seal culling in Canada as it's just not justified.
The government shouldn't be dragging their heels and waiting for the EU to ban imports etc, we as a HUMANE CARING country should be stopping this now to help eventually stop this extremely barbaric practice.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Ban-Seal-Items/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
